short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal experience for the new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
mnml new tab is a sleek and customizable browser extension designed to transform your new tab page into a minimalist and efficient workspace. With mnml new tab, say goodbye to cluttered and distracting default new tab pages and embrace a clean and focused browsing experience.

The extension offers customization options, to choose the bookmarks folder to pull in the bookmarks to show. To customize, use the "options" link.
